data.actual_result: "New unreads" banner doesn't appear until channel is entirely out of view
data.expected_result: "New unreads" banner appears when channel is slightly out of view
data.short_description: "New unreads" banner doesn't appear when an unread channel is slightly in view at the top of the channel list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with an unread channel near the top of the channel list - Scroll down the channel list so the channel is slightly out of view - Look for the "New unreads" banner - Note: the banner appears when an unread channel is slightly out of view on the bottom of the channel list
